summary: This project enhances MkDocs documentation with AI-powered features like intelligent summary generation and reading statistics. It supports multiple AI services, automatic summary creation, multi-language support, and content cleaning. The system also offers intelligent caching, flexible configuration, and smart reading statistics. Additional features include environment adaptability, language recognition, content type detection, and error handling. Installation can be done via direct download or Git clone methods. Configuration involves setting up hooks and local settings for optimal performance.
